pull.title: [QT] fix thin space word wrap line brake issue
pull.body: The thin space QT html hack results in cut-off chars/nums after a line break. Avoid word wrap line breaks by using a smaller font and a line break before each alternative value).

events.message:
[QT] fix thin space word wrap line brake issue

The thin space QT html hack results in cut-off chars/nums after a line break.

Avoid word wrap line breaks by using a smaller font and a line break before each alternative value)

events.body: utACK needs backport to 0.11 and possibly 0.10
Binaries: https://bitcoin.jonasschnelli.ch/pulls/6694/ Linux Gitian/QT5: Windows:

issue.title: Backport bugfixes to 0.11
issue.body: Travis is failing this weirdly, and I'm not sure why. Working on troubleshooting it, but I need to go to bed... so tomorrow I guess.

events.body: Can't reproduce on fedora 23, GNOME. Concept ACK, though.
Backported to 0.11 as 834e299564cb2b6fad7d4ea76d03a2c15fc80561, to 0.10 as f696ea12e18b9f9e1518a59f3ad36ba887f4f31a

issue.title: 'Confirm send coins' dialog shows incorrect amount
issue.body:
I tried sending 50 BTC. The confirmation dialog told me that was 000 025 uBTC. It seems to be missing the first two digits:

![screenshot from 2015-09-16 11 49 33](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/573356/9914976/5c9c080c-5c69-11e5-942d-47bcb9cab70d.png)

I built from commit 536207f3167daad1fa3d60a1de7d9cb55db28ac9
Date:   Fri Sep 4 17:03:24 2015 +0200

Edit: it appears to work fine for smaller amounts:

![screenshot from 2015-09-16 11 58 41](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/573356/9915155/58d09ff2-5c6a-11e5-8ceb-27378fd88da8.png)
